```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

New Function
```{r}
load_dictionary<-function(filename){
  w=read.delim(filename)
  w$words
} 

```

New Variables
```{r}
valid_list<-load_dictionary("google-10000-english-usa-no-swears.txt")
solution_list <- load_dictionary("google-10000-english-usa-no-swears.txt")

```
